ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities include addressing the issue of slider end drag markers blocking the opening of control point piece context menus, with a failing test case added to prevent future regressions. Furthermore, a pull request was merged that fixes this issue and includes extended test coverage to prevent regression of related problems.

ppy/osu-server-beatmap-submission.summary: Significant activities involve implementing required interactions with beatmap mirrors, including the ability to purge outdated cached packages. A pull request was merged that implements these interactions, which were tested in a full-stack local environment to ensure functionality.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities focus on fixing the display of incorrect profile pictures in Twitter, specifically addressing the issue of osu!support's profile picture having a white box behind it. A pull request was merged that resolves this problem, with changes tested against the contribution checklist to ensure quality and accuracy.
